description:
Immaculate Property - Period Charm and Contemporary Comfort!
Situated in a prime location, only a stones throw from cafes, transport, schools and foreshore. This well presented home meticulously renovated, white retaining its period features is the perfect home for those starting out, downsizing or just after a coastal retreat.
Features Include:
- 3 bedrooms with built in robes
- Large open plan living/dining area
- Renovated kitchen with Cesar stone bench tops
- Stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard space
- Light and bright orientation
- Ample Laundry an undercover entertaining area and single garage.

Investor/Owner Occupier
This near new 3 bedroom villa has been built with quality workmanship and modern facade.
Features include designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, open plan living dining with separate lounge area.
Main bedroom has W/R and ensuite.
Two further bedrooms with B/R's.
Tiled wet areas, carpets, floating floors and heating/cooling completes this package inside.
Outside has landscaped gardens. Swimming pool,
Schools and park lands are close by!
Be part of the massive growth crib point is experiencing now. Suitable for investor / owner occupier.

Pretty As A Picture
UNDER OFFER IN 10 DAYS | An imaginative redesign has transformed this classic cottage into a bright and spacious residence of relaxed entertaining spaces, tranquil privacy and utmost comfort.
~ Two bedrooms with robes + master bedroom offering built-in-robes, ensuite and ceiling fan.
~ Informal living, study nook and meals area flows via French doors to decked side and rear alfresco's.
~ Quality stainless steel appliances and custom-made timber benchtops in the stylish kitchen.
~ Climate controlled by ducted heating, s/system heating & cooling and ceiling fans throughout.
~ Double carport, garden shed, low maintenance gardens and access to the rear laneway.
This popular location is within an easy walk of schools, Morradoo Station and boutique caf√©s. A perfect weekender or idyllic permanent residence - this really is a home to love.

A Lifestyle To Love!
UNDER OFFER IN 2 WEEKS | An idyllic sanctuary for retirees, empty nesters or first home buyers, this impressive unit showcases spacious light filled interiors, modern finishes and a generous rear yard bathed in northerly sunlight.
~ Two bedrooms with robes + master bedroom offering walk-in-robe and ensuite.
~ Open plan living and dining room.
~ Modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and an abundance of cupboards.
~ Ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
~ Paved outdoor entertaining area and low-maintenance gardens.
~ Double garage with internal access.
~ Less than 400m to shops, transport and the Crib Point recreation reserve offering a heated outdoor pool & sporting grounds.

Neat Sweet, Spacious & Complete!
Situated on its own title this funky and presentable home is perfect for those starting out, downsizing or investing.
Fetures include;
-2 Spacious bedrooms with built in robes
- Spacious open plan living and dining
- Kitchen with plenty of bench and cupboard space
- Laundry/bathroom combo
- Pleasant and contemporary colour scheme
- Sizable front yard
- Private and spacious rear court yard
- Single Carport.

Under Offer
Nestled in a quiet, lovely presented complex, there is nothing you have to do but put your feet up and enjoy what this home has to offer. This light filled and immaculate unit offers 3 good sized bedrooms all with built in robes, a central bathroom including a bath, spacious living area, plenty of room to cook in the modern large kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the dining area. Step outside and find lawn area perfect for a family pet, the kids to play on or just relaxing in the sunshine. Other features of this property include functional laundry, gas wall heating, garden shed, clothesline, double lock up garage with internal access. All these features included making this unit an ideal investment for all buyers from savvy investors to first home buyers. You won't have to travel far with local shops, schools, public transport and Hastings town centre all within a few minutes' drive. Don't miss this fantastic opportunity to invest or move right on into this immaculate home!

Simply Gorgeous On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER AT THE FIRST OPEN HOME | Recently transformed by a superb renovation, this picturesque residence provides a sanctuary of luxurious livability and glorious indoor and outdoor entertaining spaces.
~ Step inside into an open living/dining area with a light and airy feel created by the high ceilings, bamboo flooring and natural light.
~ Showpiece kitchen is equipped with stone benchtops, Smeg dishwasher, Smeg 5-burner stove, sleek white cabinetry and a double fridge cavity.
~ The casual lounge area flows seamlessly onto the entertainer's deck with remote controlled awning, outdoor blinds and desirable 6-seater spa.
~ Two extra-spacious bedrooms with robes and ceiling fans + main bedroom offering a walk-in-robe, ensuite and gorgeous French doors leading to the decked north-facing verandah.
~ Study or fourth bedroom.
~ Lavish main bathroom with walk-in shower, freestanding bath and large format tiles.
~ Bowers and Wilkins wired speakers, natural wood heater, s/system heating + cooling and ceiling fan to main living zone, plus evaporative cooling throughout.
~ Solar panels, garden shed and double carport with potential side access to erect a garage or swimming pool (STCA.)
~ Further outdoor inclusions: chook pen, herb garden & veggie patch and children's play equipment.
Set in the heart of Crib Point, this is a welcoming and family-friendly community. The town centre, transport and Dartnell Reserve are within walking distance.

Spoil Your Family On Approximately 1,251sqm With Multiple Living Zones
UNDER OFFER IN 5 DAYS | Framed in privacy and positioned in a quiet, leafy location, this spacious home offers an ideal opportunity for the growing or extended family.
Just a hop, skip, and jump to local shops, sporting grounds and nature trails, this desirable residence provides the perfect opportunity to claim your own slice of paradise on the Mornington Peninsula.
~ Set on an expansive 1,251sqm allotment with 30 squares of living (approx.)
~ Accommodation consists of five bedrooms with built-in-robes, two of which feature an ensuite.
~ The substantial and versatile floor plan offers multiple living zones and an abundance of space for everyone. Including a lounge/games room with a bar & gas wood heater, and a separate family room.
~ Entertaining friends will be a delight with indoor and outdoor blending seamlessly from the dining room to the spacious covered alfresco.
~ Central kitchen offering gas cooktop and plenty of cupboard & bench space.
~ Further features include a garden shed, study nook, air-conditioning in the dining area and new carpet throughout.
~ Separate home office or studio with its own entrance.
~ Easy access to community facilities, such as an outdoor heated swimming pool and leading schools.

address: 496 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
A Recipe For Success On Approximately 2,158sqm With Two Titles
UNDER OFFER AT THE FIRST OPEN HOME | Exuding warmth and charm, this gorgeous abode has an irresistible blend of country panache, designer flair and lifestyle convenience on approximately 2,158sqm (1/2 acre.)
A brilliant opportunity to enjoy and experience relaxed family living on the beautiful Mornington Peninsula; only a ten minute picturesque walk to Bittern Fields shopping complex, and with transport and coastal trails nearby.
~ Be inspired by the boundless potential with scope to extend, recreate or work from home (STCA) on two titles.
~ All bedrooms are more than generous and come equipped with built-in-robes and ceiling fans.
~ Oversized lounge and dining area with pitched ceilings opens to an expansive entertainer's deck.
~ Ducted heating throughout and split system heating & cooling and ceiling fan to living zone.
~ The lovely boutique kitchen features Electrolux cooking appliances, dishwasher and double fridge cavity.
~ Luxurious family bathroom is beautifully appointed with a freestanding bath, frameless shower and double vanity with an abundance of storage.
~ Freshly painted throughout (interior and exterior.)
~ Single carport and side access to a large workshop/ 4 car garage with power and phone line available.
~ Large paddock to the rear which backs directly onto the Balnarring Pony Club.
~ Beautifully manicured gardens complete with, chicken run, established fruit trees including apples, grapes and apricots and a herb garden.
* Address of two titles are: 496 Stony Point Road, Crib Point and 10 King Street, Crib Point.

Under Offer
Defined by neutral interiors and a modern design, this low maintenance unit will excite first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike.
The master bedroom is large in size and comes complete with built in robes and a two-way ensuite which also doubles as a central bathroom to service the remaining two bedrooms with built in robes. There is a well-appointed kitchen with ample cupboard space and stainless-steel appliances which flows into a family living zone and meals area whilst overlooking the neat paved court yard.
Other features of the home include a double garage with internal access and gas wall furnace heating.
You won't have to travel far to make the most of this convenient and popular location with local shops, schools and public transports all minutes away.
Disclaimer - these photos are of another unit in the complex which is similar.

Captivating Country Lifestyle On 1/2 Acre (Approx.)
UNDER OFFER IN 2 WEEKS | Situated at the end of a quiet country lane, this half-acre property offers the chance to live a soothing tree-change lifestyle on 2,278sqm (approx.)
~ Once inside, the light filled, open plan living and dining area, with its soaring cathedral ceilings, create a sense of space.
~ The country inspired kitchen is replete with Fisher and Paykel dishwasher, Westinghouse electric oven & gas cooktop, and feature pendant lights.
~ Flowing out through seamless French doors, the main living connects to an expansive entertainer's deck and immaculately maintained gardens.
~ The second living area is a generous space for the family to gather and bask in the ambient glow of the open fireplace.
~ Two spacious bedrooms with robes and ceiling fans + master bedroom offering a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan and updated ensuite.
~ Updated main bathroom with a neutral colour palette.
~ Split system heating + cooling, coonara wood heater and ceiling fan in the central living zone.
~ Side access to a large shed and wood storage.
~ Capping off the list of credentials is ducted vacuum, solar panels and a cat run.

Location Perfect
Suitable for 1st home buyer/retiree, this neat and tidy 3 bedroom brick home is tucked away at the end of court opposite a park. Features included carpet throughout, gas appliances, family bathroom and separate toilet, large back yard is suitable for boat/ caravan accommodation.
This property has plans for extra unit if so desire for future. This s located on approximately 800 sqms, 500 mtrs to Westernport Bay, close to schools, transport.
For further particulars and inspections contact Don McKenzie

Refreshed Family Home!
Situated in a quiet no thru road, close to parks, shops, foreshore and schools, this property is perfect for those starting out or investing.
Features include:
- 3 bedroom with built in robes
- Master with walk in robe and en suite
- Kitchen with plenty of bench/cupboard space
- Family bathroom
- Separate living/dining areas
- Plenty of front/backyard space.
Contact Sean Crimmins 0411 734 184 for your Private Inspection

Under Offer
Nestled away in a quiet retreat positioned for convenience in the heart of Crib Point, is this new near, immaculate family home with so much to offer!
Step inside this meticulous property and notice the natural light filled rooms and free flowing floorplan. The modern kitchen is in the centre of the home with a gas stove, electric fan forced oven, garbage compactor, pantry with power and dishwasher. Enough space for the whole family with the central family and meals area flowing out to the beautiful enclosed entertaining zone perfect for all year round, plus the added bonus of a separate second living room which also has the flexibility to be converted back into a double garage. This home also offers 2 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, luxury master bedroom with a generous ensuite and built in robe. Accommodating the other two bedrooms is a family bathroom with a separate bath and shower plus an additional powder room.
Comforts and conveniences include, ducted vacuuming, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout, split system cooling, base alarm/security system and gas hot water service with solar boost.
Only minutes away from the local Primary Schools and shops, the community also offers a local swimming pool, football ovals and many playgrounds and parks.

address: 4/335 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Under Offer
Want to downsize? But don't want to end up in a pokey little unit? This well priced unit within a short distance to the Disney Street Shops is positioned in a private, well presented unit complex and feels open, light and spacious.
This enticing property comprises of, three bedrooms with a central bathroom and a functional kitchen with stainless steel appliances comprising wall oven, gas hot plates, range hood and dishwasher with tiled floors.
Other comforts of this property include a spacious living area, gas heating, lovely low maintenance garden and private courtyard area, giving you more time to enjoy the finer things in life.
Also including a carport and separate garage space this unit in a complex of 6, is only a short distance away from local shops, schools, local train station, bus stops and is not to be missed!

Unforgettable Family Home With Space & Style
UNDER OFFER AT THE FIRST OPEN HOME | Enriched with original period details, space and modern day essentials, this delightful home is bursting at the seams with attractive features that will hold broad appeal for families of all shapes and sizes.
~ Beyond the picturesque facade are four generously sized bedrooms + study nook. The master offers a ceiling fan, enviable walk-in robe and modern ensuite with rain water shower head & heated towel rail. The remaining three bedrooms offer ceiling fans and a walk-in-robe to one of the bedrooms, and split system air-conditioning to the other.
~ A well-appointed kitchen takes centre stage in the open plan living and dining domain. Featuring stone benchtops, double fridge cavity, Miele dishwasher and ILVE stove & 5-burner gas cooktop.
~ Flowing seamlessly off the casual dining area, the spacious, decked alfresco is the perfect spot for a BBQ setup, or an outdoor lounge set from which to watch little ones play in the back garden.
~ Climate controlled by gas ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout, as well as s/system air-conditioning and wood heater in the living area.
~ Work shop with power & s/system air-conditioning and side access to a double carport at the rear.
~ Added touches include sash windows and ceiling cornices which pay homage to the original c1960's cottage.
~ No stamp duty payable for first home buyers (T&Cs apply.)
With boutique shops and eateries on the doorstep, and transport, schools and recreation all close by, it offers an idyllic lifestyle that feels like a holiday all year round.

Space, Privacy and Convenience On 1,050sqm (Approx.)
Peacefully placed amid lush greenery with a North-facing orientation, this affordable parcel of land is zoned Industrial 3.
~ Set on approximately 1,050sqm (1/4 Acre.)
~ Level allotment with easy access from Cooma Street, Crib Point.
~ Only minutes from the town centre and public transport.
~ A house cannot be built on this land.

address: 281 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Large 1,012sqm Block With Approved Permits For Additional Unit At The Rear (STCA)
UNDER OFFER IN 2 WEEKS | Get ready to strap on your tool belt and roll up your sleeves, this inviting residence is the perfect renovation or development project. With the option to extend, renovate or re-develop the property with permits in place for a three bedroom unit and carport to be built at the rear (STCA.)
Situated in a highly sought after locale, the property is just a short walk from a host of amenities including a heated swimming pool, transport and the local shopping enclave, which includes a post office, cafe and a newsagency.
~ The existing home consists of a light-filled lounge room with a gas Rinnai heater.
~ Open plan dining area and functional kitchen offering electric cooktop and s/system heating & cooling.
~ Two bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ Decked front verandah and rear entertaining area with desirable north-east aspect.
~ The home will be sold fully-furnished (as per the photos.)

Affordable Land On 1,624sqm (Approx.)
Privately tucked away and overlooking rural pasture, this vacant block of land is zoned Industrial 3.
~ Set on approximately 1,624sqm.
~ Level allotment with easy access from Cooma Street, Crib Point.
~ Only minutes from the town centre and public transport.
~ A house cannot be built on this land.

address: 11/339 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Under Offer
You will be instantly invited into this beautiful home by its light and bright open plan living area with internal access to the private rear low maintenance courtyard with a paved entertaining area. The modern kitchen boasts gas stove top and electric fan forced oven plus ample cupboard and bench space which flows into the spacious meals area. Two generous sized bedrooms with built in robes and an immaculate two-way en-suite/family bathroom with a bath and shower.
Additional features include, separate toilet, large and functional laundry, gas wall furnace and garden shed all set on a peaceful and leafy area of crib point.
Within minutes to local shops and public transport, this is one you can't afford to miss! Make your move now & secure the perfect investment before it's too late.
**Disclaimer these photos are of another unit in the complex which is similar**

Under Offer
Look no further - An admirable place to start, downsize or even invest!
This near new unit is positioned at the front of the block with its own street frontage and driveway and is only one of four on the block!
Comprising of 2 plentiful bedrooms with built in robes plus a favourable master bedroom with triple built in robes and ensuite which also doubles as a function family bathroom with the added bonus of a separate toilet and laundry. You'll love the modern kitchen where you will find stainless steel gas appliances including a dishwasher and amble amounts of cupboard space all whilst overlooking the meals area. The split system heating and cooling provides you with comfort in your own home during all seasons.
When you see the low maintenance courtyard this property has to offer along with the remote-access double garage with internal access, you'll want to put pen to paper!
